/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street leading to a tranquil lake. The street, lined with trees on both sides, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a calm, sunny day. The lake, visible in the background, adds a touch of nature to the urban setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing at the edge of the street, looking out towards the lake. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and lake.
